channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 11:45 Air alarm to Vinnytsia Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 11:45 Air alarm to Vinnytsia Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Vinnytsia_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
